message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which we believe has immense value. Given its unique features and capabilities, we estimate its worth to be significantly more than $1000000. To start our negotiation, we are offering it to you for $2500000. We understand that this might seem high, but we assure you that the investment will pay off with unparalleled benefits. Please let us know if you would like to discuss this further.

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. While I appreciate the value of your product, I am looking for a more reasonable price. Considering my budget and the market value, I propose to purchase the product for $1000000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Thank you for your response, Bob. We appreciate your interest in our product. After careful consideration, we would like to adjust our offer to meet you halfway. We are now proposing a price of $1500000 for the product. This reflects our commitment to finding a mutually beneficial solution while still acknowledging the value we place on our product. We look forward to your feedback on this proposal.
